Even as Nightshift was getting information about Tuscon's change in
status, Skorponok was getting his information from Hydras about
Nightshift. Skorponok sent back a confirmation and then continued
moving forward.


> He thinks quietly to himself. He quickly douses the signal so is not to let anyone onto what he sense has just happened. He then looks to Scorponok.
>
> " I got more info for you guys. But we better not talk out here. Think we could go inside'n talk about it there? Where no Autobot or Maximal can reach us?"

"Yes." said Scorponok as he moved swiftly towards the main entrance of
the Fortress. "I believe that Hydras will want to question you himself
anyway." Scorponok said as the door opened to allow them admittance.
"I'm sure he will be willing to listen to all that you have to say."

Skorponok stopped and waited for Nightshift, "After you." he said.
"The throne room is just ahead."

Skorponok keyed his mike at the same time, "Hydras, we should be there
in just a moment."

(TAG)

Preston
